channel.title: Rs server help
channel.description:
i have made a server i can join but mine friend cant some ppl say something about ports /virtual server
can some1 help me here is mine router
im using nixscape
[URL=http://img70.imageshack.us/my.php?image=router8pm.png][IMG]http://img70.imageshack.us/img70/7717/router8pm.th.png[/img][/URL]
click on the photo to make it bigger

item.title: Rs server help
item.dc:creator: @reaperofdb reaperofdb
item.description:
@reaperofdb wrote:

Okay one second let me check what ports you need to set.

Edit: Okay, pick a random line, change the first thing to “both”, change both port ranges to
43594. Then, hold the windows key and press “r.” Then, type cmd in the window that pops up. Press enter. Now type ipconfig. You should see something that says “Connection-specific DNS suffix” and underneat it, it says “IP address.” The number should be something like 192.168.1.X. X being a number, type X in the last input box that says “0.” Then save changes or whatever and it should work.

Read full topic
